header_text: You have a cold, but you decide to go to the grocery store since you feel well enough. You can't help but cough a few times, and you worry that others are judging you. No one has noticed you coughing, so you feel better about your decision to go to the store.

elements.Text: Are you glad that you went to the grocery store?
